document_data.name: Sheaf Arrow
document_data.mainbody: '''Sheaf arrows''', also called '''war arrows''',  were [[arrow]]s that were designed to cause the most physical harm.
document_data.Description: Far shorter than [[flight arrow]]s, sheaf arrows measured between {{SI|20|"|c|long=yes}} and {{SI|27|"|c|long=yes}} in length. Sheaf arrows were heavy arrows terminating with sharpened [[steel]] tips. These arrows could only be effectively fired with a [[longbow]].
document_data.Uses: Sheaf arrows were primarily used in warfare.
document_data.Notable Users:
* [[Ardasir al-Darah]], a [[janni]] of the [[Haunted Lands]], carried sheaf arrows.
* [[Elorfindar Floshin]] of [[Daggerford]] carried enchanted sheaf arrows.
